questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of using a Linked Smart Object over a regular one?

choices.answer: Perform Non-Destructive transforms without losing quality
Perform Destructive transforms without losing quality

questions.question: What happens when you Copy and Paste layer styles from one layer onto another layer with style?

choices.answer: The existing layer style isn't replaced by the pasted ones
Both styles are layered over each other
The existing layer styles are replaced with the pasted ones

questions.question: What would be the best way to apply layer effects and smart filters to all images in a project?

choices.answer: Save Layer effect as Styles>Apply Layer Style to images.
Copy Layer Effect>Paste on all images in folder.

questions.question: What is Balance?

choices.answer: the physical distance between the visual elements in a image
All the elements of the image have a visual connection.
Equalizing the visual distribution of elements in an image.
Visually showing prominence of some visual elements.

questions.question: What is Emphasis?

choices.answer: the physical distance between the visual elements in a image
All the elements of the image have a visual connection.
Equalizing the visual distribution of elements in an image.
Visually showing prominence of some visual elements.

questions.question: What is Unity/Harmony?

choices.answer: the physical distance between the visual elements in a image
All the elements of the image have a visual connection.
Equalizing the visual distribution of elements in an image.
Visually showing prominence of some visual elements.

questions.question: What is Proximity?

choices.answer: the physical distance between the visual elements in a image
All the elements of the image have a visual connection.
Equalizing the visual distribution of elements in an image.
Visually showing prominence of some visual elements.

questions.question: What information will you need from a client before you can use their photos in a brochure?

choices.answer: Copyright Permission for all five images
Specific expectations they have about the design
Permission to apply filters in non-destructive ways

choices.answer: JPG
RAW
TIFF
BMP

questions.question: What does the paint bucket tool do?

choices.answer: Draws hard edge lines and strokes that can't be softened
Paints using data form a selected previous state or snapshot
Fills the chosen area on the canvas w/ the foreground color
Paints lines and strokes of selected colors and settings

questions.question: What does the pencil tool do?

choices.answer: Draws hard-edged lines and strokes that cannot be softened
Paints with stylized strokes
Paints using data from a selected previous state or snapshot
Paints lines and strokes of selected colors and settings

questions.question: What tool is used to paint with stylized strokes, using data from selected history state

choices.answer: Mixer brush tool
History Brush tool
Art History brush tool
Paint Bucket tool

questions.question: What tool paints using data from a selected previous state or snapshot?

choices.answer: Paint brush tool
History Brush tool
Mixer Brush tool
Art History Brush tool

questions.question: what tool stimulates realistic-looking painting techniques, such as blending canvas colors?

choices.answer: Mixer Brush tool
Art History tool
Brush tool
Pencil Tool

questions.question: What tool paints lines and strokes of selected colors and settings?

choices.answer: Art History Brush tool
History Brush tool
Brush tool
Mixer Brush tool

questions.question: The amount of space between two particular characters to make them look more natural as a pair

choices.answer: Kerning
Point
Tracking
Baseline

questions.question: The amount of space between all the characters in a selected block of type.

choices.answer: Kerning
Tracking
Baseline
Point

questions.question: What are two advantages to using Smart Object Layers for photos?

choices.answer: Able to apply filters in editable, non-destructive ways
Can be reused for web pages, or brochures
Simulates realistic-looking colors
Convert Bitmap images to vector graphics

questions.question: If a clients color scheme has clashing colors that look unattractive, what should you do?

choices.answer: Leave color scheme as is and follow the clients choices
Change the color scheme to a more appealing colors
Raise concerns of the color scheme and make suggestions

questions.question: What is the best tool to move a person far from a group closer to it?

choices.answer: Content-aware move
Transform
Magic Wand
Move tool

questions.question: What would be the most appropriate size for a full-width banner ad you created?

choices.answer: W: 70pixels / H: 928pixels
W: 90pixels / H: 728pixels
W: 928pixels / H: 70pixels
W: 728pixels / H: 90pixels

questions.question: What are Pixels?

choices.answer: Digital Images made up of individual dots in a grid
The individual dots/points that make up an image on a screen
Digital images made up of mathematical line, curves & shapes
A measurement of the digital images size by dots on a grid

questions.question: What is a Bitmap graphic?

choices.answer: Digital Images made up of individual dots in a grid
The individual dots/points that make up an image on a screen
Digital images made up of mathematical line, curves & shapes
A measurement of the digital images size by dots on a grid

questions.question: What is a Vector Graphic?

choices.answer: Digital Images made up of individual dots in a grid
The individual dots/points that make up an image on a screen
Digital images made up of mathematical line, curves & shapes
A measurement of the digital images size by dots on a grid

questions.question: What is Resolution?

choices.answer: Digital Images made up of individual dots in a grid
The individual dots/points that make up an image on a screen
Digital images made up of mathematical line, curves & shapes
A measurement of the digital images size by dots on a grid

questions.question: Which two steps should be taken to export an image that is going to be used as a book cover

choices.answer: Modify the design with Soft Proofing
Change image color mode to RGB
Export using Save for Web Command
Change image color mode to CMYK

choices.answer: Modify the design with Soft Proofing
Change image color mode to RGB
Export using Save for Web Command

choices.answer: Lower size of the brush
Raise the size of the brush
Set hardness of brush to 100%
Set hardness of brush to 50%

questions.question: What is the benefit of creating snapshots in the history panel as you're working?

choices.answer: You can return to the moment the snapshot was taken
You can compare the effects of applying filters

questions.question: Whats the advantage of linking images instead of embedding them?

choices.answer: Snapshots let you compare the effects of applying filters
All visible layers are combined into one layer
Linked files contain full copies of the external file's info
Hidden layers are discarded

questions.question: What is an early step in designing a new image for use as a book cover?

choices.answer: Establish a general layout and color scheme
Compare the effects of applying filters
Communicate the purpose of an advertisment
Store at a high resolution in Tiff format

questions.question: How do you present an image to a client in order to get their approval?

choices.answer: In a Jpeg file
A preliminary mock up
A rough sketch
In a Tiff file

questions.question: What specific additional permission must you obtain before you can use an image  for web-design

choices.answer: Copies of the "Model release" from everyone who appears
Permission to apply non-destructive filters
copyright permission for all images

questions.question: What does the visual design of typography help communicate?

choices.answer: The physical distance between visual elements in an image
A measurement of a digital image's size

questions.question: Which two of the following statements are true about the role of typography in visual design?

choices.answer: A rough sketch
When laying out text, consider the style, color and spacing.
Select typefaces that help illustrate the style and tone

Combines all layers into one

choices.answer: Talk to the client about specific expectations they have

questions.question: which 3 of the following describe the advantages of linking your Photoshop  files to indesign?

choices.answer: All Photoshop linked layers can be made visible or invisible
The transparency settings in layers & mask are recogognized
The vector text & shapes are accepted as vector objects
Files are easy to open

questions.question: Which of the following statements about using vector masks are true?

choices.answer: The masks create clean, defined edges
The shape creating the masks can be edited later
The masks are resolution-independent, can be easily enlarged
Reduces file size
